about_the_game:
Your ship has been forced to crash land on an uninhabited alien planet. The good news it that even though humanity hasn't settled here, the planet is ripe with resources. The bad news is it's also like SUPER dangerous. You'll need them to use everything available to you to find away off this planet and back to the stars. Lead your fellow survivors through this world, fighting, exploring, hunting, gathering and building. Craft the basics from scratch and salvage Space Age technology from your ship. Raise a base that will sustain and protect you from rival factions, boss monsters, alien wildlife and whatever else is out there... Find a way home.

Key Features
  • Explore a procedural environment across multiple biomes
  • Uncover the mysteries on the planet
  • Fight for your life against wild aliens, huge bosses and more aliens but in tribes
  • Or make peace with the alien tribes somehow...
  • Build a village for you and your fellow survivors using fully modular pieces
  • Take care of your villagers and bring them with you into combat
  • Hey, they're kinda cute...
  • Build defenses to ready yourself for hostile raids
  • Construct vehicles
  • Balance Economy, Science and Crafting advance your village
  • Loot wreckage from your ship and crashed escape pods to salvage Space Age technology that will turn the tide of combat and survival
  • Play with your friends throughout the entire game!
  • You can pet the Space Dog
